code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Info=_ref=>{let{id,data,onChange,list01,list02,name}=_ref;const[open,setOpen]=useState();const navigate=useNavigate();const list={dataList:list01,dataContent:list02};const setChange=()=>{if(list01==true)return;else{setOpen(true);}};const onClick=e=>{const values=e.textContent;navigate("".concat(name,"/").concat(values));};useEffect(()=>{setChange();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"formBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{id:"myForm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{form:"myForm",id:id,onChange:onChange,name:id,children:data.map((v,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:v.name,children:v.name},id+i);})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"listBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"list_title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC815\uCC45\uBA85"})}),open&&list.dataContent.map((v,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:e=>onClick(e.target),children:list.dataList[i]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:[v]})]},'list'+i);})]})})})]});};export default Info;
